name: To the Crown
description:
The Crown of Epire waits you. But to reach that, you have to pass through the hard way from the low places of medieval society. Plenty of upgrades will help you to increase your production power, number of your people and the way you look.

PS: Game has auto-save function, so don't afraid to lose your progress by closing game.

And a few words:

This game is my first project in game development, so I really want to hear your opinion.

Also, please follow me on Youtube.

And Thank You for play:)
